## hexToCartesian() function

Convert a hex coordinate to a cartesian coordinate.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function hexToCartesian(coordinate: HexCoordinate, size: number, orientation: HexOrientation): CartesianCoordinate;
```

A hex orientation.


</td></tr>

**Returns:**

[CartesianCoordinate](./hive-lib.cartesiancoordinate.md)

A cartesian coordinate representing the center of the hexagon.
